com.marklogic.semantics.rdf4j.client

Class MarkLogicClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.semantics.rdf4j.client.MarkLogicClient

  • public class MarkLogicClient
extends java.lang.Object
    An internal class that straddles Rdf4j and MarkLogic Java client API.
